Welcome to PlaceToGo Thank you for installing. Prepare to get amazed. Lets Go!!
Challenge Much? Find traditional way of exploring boring? Well, here we have list of challenges for you to take and have an amusing experience with achievement points!!!
Roam Around Alot? Can\'t decide where to eat or go? Give it to us. We will find you the best yet nearest place you want to eat or visit.
Just Say It! Want to move around faster? Well you can use our speech recognition feature to look for a place to go instead of typing it out. Refresh
